name: ROBTIC KID TO FACING!
description:
An entry to DUPLICADE. This is arguably the worst thing I've ever put out quality-wise but I think it gets the "bootleg game" style across quite well.

Controls:

P1: WASD to move, Space to fire.

P2: Arrow Keys to move, Enter to fire.

Shoot at the opposition's target to earn points. You can block your opponents bullets by moving over them. It's pretty simple.

Made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5. Music composed in FamiTracker.

I apologize in advance.
